summary: The concept of "plastic waste" pertains to the deterioration of the environment, a critical issue addressed within EU legal and regulatory frameworks. The EU has implemented various directives aimed at reducing plastic waste, promoting recycling, and fostering sustainable practices. Notably, the Single-Use Plastics Directive seeks to mitigate the environmental impact of plastic pollution in marine and terrestrial ecosystems. Regulations also emphasize the importance of circular economy principles, encouraging the reduction of plastic production and consumption. By addressing plastic waste, the EU aims to enhance environmental protection, public health, and resource efficiency, aligning with broader sustainability goals.
